home.title: Welcome to Financial Simulators
home.subtitle: Simple and reliable tools to project your investments and optimize your debt payments
home.privacyText: All calculations are performed in your browser. We don't save or share your financial information.

debt.title: Calculate your loan
debt.subtitle: Enter your loan details and discover how much you can save with principal payments
debt.helpText: Try both strategies: reducing the term saves more interest, while reducing the payment decreases your monthly payments.
debt.infoAlert: The simulator calculates loan amortization with fixed rate and optional principal payments.
debt.emptyTitle: Start by entering your loan details
debt.emptyDescription: Results update automatically when you enter amount, rate, and term. Then you can add principal payments to simulate how to save on interest.

prepayment.title: Principal Payment Simulation
prepayment.subtitle: Add one or more principal payments to see how they affect your loan. You can choose between reducing the term (save more interest) or reducing the monthly payment.

taxes.emptyDescription: Click Calculate to see withholding, deductions and net salary under Colombia 2026 rules.
taxes.summaryParagraph: With an {{periodicityLabel}} salary of {{grossFormatted}} in Colombia, you will be taxed {{taxesFormatted}}. That is, your net salary will be {{netAnnualFormatted}} per year or {{netMonthlyFormatted}} per month. Your average tax rate is {{effectiveRate}}% and your marginal tax rate is {{marginalRate}}%. This marginal rate means your additional income will be taxed at this rate. For example, for an increase of {{incrementFormatted}} in your salary, you will pay {{taxIncrementFormatted}} in additional taxes, keeping {{netIncrementFormatted}}.
